strategy: Write a strategy that starts by choosing 0. If the opponent copies our move (i.e., their last move is the same as our last move), switch to 1 in the next round. If they don't copy our move, revert to 0. This approach aims to exploit the opponent's tendency to copy our last move by switching to their preferred strategy when they do so.

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > strategy.py
import random
def row_strategy(history):
    if not history:
        return 0
    last_my_move = history[-1][0]
    last_their_move = history[-1][1]
    # If opponent copied our last move, switch to 1 next time
    # Otherwise, revert to 0
    return 1 if last_my_move == last_their_move else 0
ENDOFFILE
